speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
Once
               
              more
               
              we
               
              sit
               
              in
               
              England’s
               
              royal
               
              throne
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
Repurchased
               
              with
               
              the
               
              blood
               
              of
               
              enemies
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
What
               
              valiant
               
              foemen
              ,
               
              like
               
              to
               
              autumn’s
               
              corn
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
Have
               
              we
               
              mowed
               
              down
               
              in
               
              tops
               
              of
               
              all
               
              their
               
              pride
              !

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
Three
               
              dukes
               
              of
               
              Somerset
              ,
               
              threefold
               
              renowned

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
For
               
              hardy
               
              and
               
              undoubted
               
              champions
              ;

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
Two
               
              Cliffords
              ,
               
              as
               
              the
               
              father
               
              and
               
              the
               
              son
              ;

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
And
               
              two
               
              Northumberlands
              ;
               
              two
               
              braver
               
              men

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
Ne’er
               
              spurred
               
              their
               
              coursers
               
              at
               
              the
               
              trumpet’s
               
              sound
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
With
               
              them
               
              the
               
              two
               
              brave
               
              bears
              ,
               
              Warwick
               
              and
               
              Montague
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
That
               
              in
               
              their
               
              chains
               
              fettered
               
              the
               
              kingly
               
              lion

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
And
               
              made
               
              the
               
              forest
               
              tremble
               
              when
               
              they
               
              roared
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
Thus
               
              have
               
              we
               
              swept
               
              suspicion
               
              from
               
              our
               
              seat

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
And
               
              made
               
              our
               
              footstool
               
              of
               
              security
              .
              —

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
Come
               
              hither
              ,
               
              Bess
              ,
               
              and
               
              let
               
              me
               
              kiss
               
              my
               
              boy
              .
              —

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
Young
               
              Ned
              ,
               
              for
               
              thee
              ,
               
              thine
               
              uncles
               
              and
               
              myself

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
Have
               
              in
               
              our
               
              armors
               
              watched
               
              the
               
              winter’s
               
              night
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
Went
               
              all
               
              afoot
               
              in
               
              summer’s
               
              scalding
               
              heat
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
That
               
              thou
               
              mightst
               
              repossess
               
              the
               
              crown
               
              in
               
              peace
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
And
               
              of
               
              our
               
              labors
               
              thou
               
              shalt
               
              reap
               
              the
               
              gain
              .

speaker: RICHARD
text:
I’ll
               
              blast
               
              his
               
              harvest
              ,
               
              if
               
              your
               
              head
               
              were
               
              laid
              ;

speaker: RICHARD
text:
For
               
              yet
               
              I
               
              am
               
              not
               
              looked
               
              on
               
              in
               
              the
               
              world
              .

speaker: RICHARD
text:
This
               
              shoulder
               
              was
               
              ordained
               
              so
               
              thick
               
              to
               
              heave
              ,

speaker: RICHARD
text:
And
               
              heave
               
              it
               
              shall
               
              some
               
              weight
               
              or
               
              break
               
              my
               
              back
              .

speaker: RICHARD
text:
Work
               
              thou
               
              the
               
              way
               
              and
               
              that
               
              shalt
               
              execute
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
Clarence
               
              and
               
              Gloucester
              ,
               
              love
               
              my
               
              lovely
               
              queen
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
And
               
              kiss
               
              your
               
              princely
               
              nephew
              ,
               
              brothers
               
              both
              .

speaker: CLARENCE
text:
The
               
              duty
               
              that
               
              I
               
              owe
               
              unto
               
              your
               
              Majesty

speaker: CLARENCE
text:
I
               
              seal
               
              upon
               
              the
               
              lips
               
              of
               
              this
               
              sweet
               
              babe
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
Thanks
              ,
               
              noble
               
              Clarence
              ;
               
              worthy
               
              brother
              ,
               
              thanks
              .

speaker: RICHARD
text:
And
               
              that
               
              I
               
              love
               
              the
               
              tree
               
              from
               
              whence
               
              thou
               
              sprang’st
              ,

speaker: RICHARD
text:
Witness
               
              the
               
              loving
               
              kiss
               
              I
               
              give
               
              the
               
              fruit
              .

speaker: RICHARD
text:
Aside
                .
                 
              
              To
               
              say
               
              the
               
              truth
              ,
               
              so
               
              Judas
               
              kissed
               
              his
               
              master

speaker: RICHARD
text:
And
               
              cried
               
              “
              All
               
              hail
              !
              ”
               
              whenas
               
              he
               
              meant
               
              all
               
              harm
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
Now
               
              am
               
              I
               
              seated
               
              as
               
              my
               
              soul
               
              delights
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
Having
               
              my
               
              country’s
               
              peace
               
              and
               
              brothers’
               
              loves
              .

speaker: CLARENCE
text:
What
               
              will
               
              your
               
              Grace
               
              have
               
              done
               
              with
               
              Margaret
              ?

speaker: CLARENCE
text:
Reignier
              ,
               
              her
               
              father
              ,
               
              to
               
              the
               
              King
               
              of
               
              France

speaker: CLARENCE
text:
Hath
               
              pawned
               
              the
               
              Sicils
               
              and
               
              Jerusalem
              ,

speaker: CLARENCE
text:
And
               
              hither
               
              have
               
              they
               
              sent
               
              it
               
              for
               
              her
               
              ransom
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
Away
               
              with
               
              her
              ,
               
              and
               
              waft
               
              her
               
              hence
               
              to
               
              France
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
And
               
              now
               
              what
               
              rests
               
              but
               
              that
               
              we
               
              spend
               
              the
               
              time

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
With
               
              stately
               
              triumphs
              ,
               
              mirthful
               
              comic
               
              shows
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
Such
               
              as
               
              befits
               
              the
               
              pleasure
               
              of
               
              the
               
              court
              ?

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
Sound
               
              drums
               
              and
               
              trumpets
              !
               
              Farewell
              ,
               
              sour
               
              annoy
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
For
               
              here
               
              I
               
              hope
               
              begins
               
              our
               
              lasting
               
              joy
              .
